Unless it’s an absolute emergency, go to different hospital for operation. It’s a pain to “recover” with 3 other patients in the same room after operation. You may get 2 hour sleep after surgery with all that noise in the room made by either other patients or hospital staff themselves.
I came in with some really bad chest pain and was just really out of it. They were busy but still got me in with great timing. The doctor, nurses, and techs were all very sweet and caring.

One of the best experiences I have had at a hospital. Everything from admitting to leaving. I had the pleasure of being on 5East for my stay. The staff was above and beyond wonderful.
